serviceDescription: I have basic skills in Adobe software for UX/UI design, including editing interfaces and designing simple banners and backdrops. My experience includes creating visually appealing layouts and graphics tailored to user needs.

My strength in web development lies in Frontend. I can effectively handle basic interface components and widgets using the knowledge and skills I've gained from my studies and hands-on practice. Currently, I am also learning how to handle algorithms to expand my expertise towards Backend development.
